name: Chubby Birdie
description:
Chubby is a little bird and the world seems to be working against him. He'll need your help to get around fighting off the trees, bugs, dangerous clouds, and some enemies trying to harm him. Help Chubby make his flight and keep him going.

Chubby Birdie is a great pick up and play game especially for children which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

It includes also a mini-game where Chubby tries to catch the falling eggs.
